Evidence.description: Evidence is the evidence that a finality provider has signed finality signatures with correct public randomness on two conflicting Babylon headers

block_height.description: `block_height` is the height of the conflicting blocks

canonical_app_hash.description: `canonical_app_hash` is the AppHash of the canonical block

canonical_finality_sig.description: `canonical_finality_sig` is the finality signature to the canonical block, where finality signature is an EOTS signature, i.e., the `s` in a Schnorr signature `(r, s)`. `r` is the public randomness already committed by the finality provider. Deserializes to `SchnorrEOTSSig`

fork_app_hash.description: `fork_app_hash` is the AppHash of the fork block

fork_finality_sig.description: `fork_finality_sig` is the finality signature to the fork block, where finality signature is an EOTS signature. Deserializes to `SchnorrEOTSSig`

fp_btc_pk.description: `fp_btc_pk` is the BTC PK of the finality provider that casts this vote

pub_rand.description: `pub_rand is` the public randomness the finality provider has committed to. Deserializes to `SchnorrPubRand`
